headline: WM Sets Date for Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2024 Earnings Release Conference Call
summary: HOUSTON, December 18, 2024--WM (NYSE: WM) announced that it will release fourth quarter and full-year 2024 financial results after the close of the market on Wednesday, Jan. 29, 2025 and host its investor conference call Thursday, Jan. 30, 2025 at 10 a.m. ET.
